text: Dr. Gerould S. Wilhelm (1948–) is an American botanist and lichenologist. He is known as author of several floras of the Chicago Region and the development of the Floristic Quality Assessment methodology, a tool to assess the integrity of natural areas. He is the Director of Research at Conservation Research Institute, a nonprofit organization "dedicated to the promotion of planning, design, restoration, and long-term management of sustainable ecological systems in built and natural environments through applied research, education, and outreach." ==Selected publications== * * * * * * * * * ==References== Category:American lichenologists Category:1948 births Category:Botanists active in North America Category:20th-century American botanists Category:21st-century American botanists Category:Living people Category:Florida State University alumni Category:Southern Illinois University Carbondale alumni
title: Gerould Wilhelm
